Articles.Content: Calling 911 because Duna and two moons look like 9-1-1.
Calling 911 to get better terms for a contract in Career Mode.
calling it due to a bunch of ppl calling it for nothing is not very nice so i call it to punish them except me(lol)
Calling it because you need help with math
Calling 911 cause I ran out of Deuterium and Helium-3.
Calling 911 while being a Schroedinger Cat.
Calling 911 so I can have the police move my stuff
Calling 911 to tell them to call 911 and telling them to call 911 and say the same thing.
Calling 911 when you are a 5G fridge.
Call 911 to ask them how to call 911
Calling 911 because you are in Europe amd Europe uses 112 (you don't know what to do when the emergency calling number is different)
Calling 911 to demand to know why they never internationally standardized all emergency numbers.
Calling 911 because I want moar boosters
Calling 911 because your neighbor has ignited too many boosters.
Calling 911 because you're bored and want someone to play Construction Simulator 2015 multiplayer with you.

Calling 911 because youre playing MSFS2020 at FL410 on heading 237 with a 48kt headwind and its really dark out in the middle of the Pacific Ocean lol. Yup a 5hr34min flight and Im barely 2 hours in.

022607142022
Calling 911 because I want to play Portal 2 co-op mode.
Calling 911 because you just have watched in the amateur telescope a huge asteroid approaching to... Anyway, too late. Let them just watch TV and enjoy.
Calling 911 because you are in Normandy and the british have just installed more boosters on the Isle of Wight to slam it into France
Calling 911 to ask if you can get the authorization to launch a handmade liquid fuel rocket from your yard (that one is a bit weird).

Calling 911 to report that you have a need, a need for speed!

("We'll send out the next available officer to write up a traffic violation for you.")
Calling 911 to test my new iPhone.

Calling 911 to find my lost iPhone because now I know where is it.

A joke of course.
I'm an Apple-free person.
Calling 911 because someone uses apple
Calling 911 because your phone stopped working
